content:
My best goods and greatest wealth can't appear on my crypto address on blockchain. There's no privatekey and can't it be robbed. No need for WoT or social recovery. We can't be ostentatious or fight against one another for it. It is spiritual. 11/10/20 01:21 

Comment: This is the thing I should read today! It comforts me after losing root/.git. This git history showed my activities at mobile .txt notes, also from when I was fighting depression. It was lost day 16 and I'm not being able to recover it. Are all things in life like this? For example, after my father died all of his memory were lost; when humans will finally guarantee permanence/persistence? 1/18/22 16:39
